title: Esporte Clube XV de Novembro (Caraguatatuba)
text:
Esporte Clube XV de Novembro, commonly known as XV de Caraguatatuba, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Caraguatatuba">Caraguatatuba</a>, <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Paulo%20%28state%29">São Paulo state</a>.
History.
The club was founded on February 18, 1934. They finished as the <a href="Campeonato%20Paulista%20Segunda%20Divis%C3%A3o">Campeonato Paulista Segunda Divisão</a> runners-up in 1997.
Stadium.
XV de Caraguatatuba play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20XV%20de%20Novembro">Estádio XV de Novembro</a>. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 5,600 people.
